errors.achievementAlreadyExists: ❌ An achievement with this name already exists.
errors.achievementNotFound: ❌ Achievement **{{achievement}}** not found! Make sure it exists.
errors.betAlreadyAccepted: ⚠️ This bet has already been accepted.
errors.betAlreadyExist: The bet has already been placed!
errors.betChannelDoesntExist: ⚠️ Error: Betting channel not found or does not exist.
errors.betLeaderboardChannelDoesntSetup: ⚠️ Betting leaderboard channel is not set.
errors.blockedReviewer: 🚫 You are not allowed to leave reviews.
errors.buttonsTimeout: The time for using the buttons has expired. Please re-run the command.
errors.channelDoesntChoose: ❌ Error: You did not specify a channel!
errors.channelMustBeTextType: ❌ Please specify a valid text channel!
errors.emptyParticipantsList: ⚠ Error: The participant list cannot be empty.
errors.eventNotFound: 🚫 Event not found or already deleted.
errors.incorrectBetAmount: The number you entered contains invalid characters or an incorrect format.
errors.incorrectId: ❌ Error: Invalid review ID or page.
errors.incorrectMember: ❌ Error: User not found or specified incorrectly.
errors.incorrectServerName: ⚠ Error: The entered server must be 'Kratos' or 'Alderan'.
errors.mustSelectCategory: 🚫 You must select a **category**, not a regular channel!
errors.noBetEventExist: ❌ The event does not exist or has already ended.
errors.noBetParticipants: ⚠ Error: No participants specified for betting.
errors.noMentions: ❌ No mentioned users in the message!
errors.noWinners: ❌ No winners found in this event.
errors.notAdmin: 🚫 You do not have administrator rights to execute this command.
errors.reviewCooldown: ⏳ You have already left a review for this user recently. Try again in **{{time}} minutes**.
errors.reviewSaveError: ❌ An error occurred while saving the review. Please try again later.
errors.selfReview: ❌ You cannot leave a review for yourself.
errors.sendMessageError: Error sending message to channel: {{error}}, Channel ID: {{channelId}}
errors.subscriptionBlocked: 🚫 The user is blocked from subscriptions for {{hours}} hours.
errors.unexpectedError: ❌ An error occurred while processing the command!
errors.unknownError: ❌ An error occurred. Please contact the administration.
errors.userBetsSame: ❌ You cannot place a bet equal to the previous one!
errors.userCanOnlyUpBet: ❌ You can only increase your bet!
errors.userDontHaveActiveBets: ❌ You have no active bets on this event.
errors.userIsBot: 🚫 You cannot use this command on a bot!
errors.userNotRegistered: ⚠️ The user has not been registered.
errors.userRegistrationDeleted: ✅ User registration for <@{{userId}}> has been deleted.

info.achievementGrantedToRole: ✅ Achievement **{{achievementName}}** granted to all with the role {{roleName}}!
info.betAcceptedUser: ✅ **Your bet on {{target}} for {{amount}} has been accepted!**
info.betCommission: :bangbang: The possible winnings are shown with a **10% commission deduction.**
info.betPlaced: Your bet of {{amount}} has been placed on {{target}}.
info.betProcessing:
:bangbang: **ATTENTION**
To successfully process your bet, transfer **destiny stones** to one of the **banks**, depending on your server.

🔹 Kratos Bank: **Xzbit**
🔹 Alderan Bank: **QQbite**

✅ Your bet of **{{betAmount}}** from character **{{nickname}}** (server **{{server}}**) on player **{{target}}** has been sent for processing!
info.betRejectedUser: ❌ **Your bet on {{target}} for {{amount}} has been rejected.**
info.betRow: **{{position}}.** <@{{userId}}> placed **{{amount}}** on **{{target}}** | odds x{{odds}} | possible winnings {{winnings}} 💰
info.categoryNowTracked: ✅ Category <#{{categoryId}}> is now tracked for raids.
info.noBets:
🎲 **{{eventName}}**
📅 **Bets are open from {{startTime}} to {{endTime}}**

❌ **No bets yet.**
info.noBotsInDB: ✅ No bots found in the database.
info.noRaids: ⚠ No raids have been created yet. Please create the first raid.
info.noSellersWithRating: ❌ No sellers with a rating yet.
info.roleCreated: ✅ A new role **{{name}}** has been created.
info.roleCriteriaUpdated:
✅ Criteria for role **{{roleName}}** updated:
- Rating: **{{requiredRating}}**
- Min. reviews: **{{minReviews}}**
- Min. positive reviews: **{{minPositiveReviews}}**
- Max. negative reviews: **{{minNegativeReviews}}**
info.roleLinkedToRaid: ✅ Role **{{roleName}}** is now linked to the raid '{{raidName}}'!
info.selectTarget:
✅ Choose who to bet on:
📌 **Available targets:** {{targets}}
info.updateBetRequestUserInfo:
:bangbang: **ATTENTION**
To successfully update your bet, send an additional **{{newAmount}} Fate Stones** to one of the **banks**, depending on your server.
Kratos Bank: **Xzbit**
Alderaan Bank: **QQbite**

✅ Your bet has been submitted for approval. You want to increase it from {{oldAmount}} to **{{amount}}**
info.userBlockedForReviews: ⏳ **{{username}}** has been blocked from receiving reviews for **{{hours}} hours**.
info.userBlockedFromReviewing: ⏳ **{{username}}** has been blocked from leaving reviews for **{{hours}} hours**.
info.userBlockedFromSubscribing: 🚫 The user is prohibited from subscribing.
info.userDontHaveReviews: ❌ The user <@{{memberId}}> has no reviews yet.
